content.question: Jimmy Carter and Ronald Reagan were similar as presidential candidates in that both

choices.label: articulated the publicâ€™s desire for less involvement in foreign affairs
capitalized on their status as Washington outsiders
promised Congress increased control over domestic matters

content.answer: capitalized on their status as Washington outsiders

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
